steps: step 2: Click on link 'Samsung ra m\u1eaft Galaxy S24 Ultra b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t: H\u1ed9p ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ef1c ch\u1ea5t, gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n 2.000 chi\u1ebfc' -> Navigate to page '*'
